name: night dreams demo
description:
night dreams is a strategy game for two players with relaxing background sound.

when you open the game press start to start the game.

then select the difficulty in this screen, the difficulty determines the number of dots at the bottom of the triangle.

for example, if the difficulty is 6, it will be like this:

after setting the difficulty, the game begins, as two players are playing against each other.

 Each player in his turn presses on one of the dots, and when the first player presses on the dot, it turns to the second player, and the goal for each player is to select a full row of dots horizontally or diagonally, and then he gets a score with the number of the row he selected.

the game ends when all dots are selected.

for the full version: https://gergagames.itch.io/nightdreams
